sourcesContent:
import './App.css'; import { useState } from 'react'; function App() { const [calculation,setCalculation] = useState('') console.log(calculation) return (
{calculation} {setCalculation('')}}id="calc-clear">c
{setCalculation(calculation+1)}}>1 {setCalculation(calculation+2)}}>2 {setCalculation(calculation+3)}}>3 {setCalculation(calculation+'+')}}>+
{setCalculation(calculation+4)}}>4 {setCalculation(calculation+5)}}>5 {setCalculation(calculation+6)}}>6 {setCalculation(calculation+'-')}}>-
{setCalculation(calculation+7)}}>7 {setCalculation(calculation+8)}}>8 {setCalculation(calculation+9)}}>9 {setCalculation(calculation+'*')}}>*
{setCalculation(calculation+0)}}>0 {setCalculation(calculation+'.')}}>. = {setCalculation(calculation+'/')}}>/
); } export default App;
